description:
Nobunaga’s main forces are trapped by Kutsuki Mototsuna and his forces. It’s then that Matsunaga says he’ll go work things out with Kutsuki. Toshiie worries about Matsunaga betraying them, but they were left with no other alternatives. What is Matsunaga up to?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mototsuna of the Valley of Kutsuki
